message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to us, we're extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $900000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept the current price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your situation and respect your decision. I'm willing to consider your counteroffer. In light of this, I propose to sell the product to you for $875000. This price reflects a compromise while still allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin.
